name: purescript-docs-search
description: Search frontend for the documentation generated by the PureScript compiler.

scripts.bundle-main: spago bundle-app -m Docs.Search.Main --to dist/main.js && browserify --no-builtins --no-commondir --no-detect-globals --node dist/main.js --outfile dist/main.js && echo "#!/usr/bin/env node" > dist/purescript-docs-search && cat dist/main.js >> dist/purescript-docs-search && rm dist/main.js && chmod +x dist/purescript-docs-search
scripts.build: npm run bundle-app && npm run bundle-main
